Release notes for Kendo UI Professional v2018.2.516

Components

What's new

  • MaskedTextBox MVVM, when the mask can be parsed to number the widget is initialized with invalid mask (#3917)
  • Update Kendo.Mvc.dll to reference System.Web.Mvc 5.2.4 to avoid warnings (#4023)
  • Implement chat-ui based on designs

What's fixed

  • 'Invalid-meta The "main" field cannot contain minified files' error is thrown when installing Kendo-UI Bower package (#4167)
  • Removing a filter applied in the configuration will still export to excel filtered data in a Grid. (#4119)
  • Missing widgets definitions in kendo typescript file. (#4018)
  • Kendo Dashboard template project hangs in IE (#3542)
  • parseDate ignores timezone sign for minutes offset (#2813)

New UI Widgets

New DropDownTree widget

UI Widgets Features and Updates

AngularJS

What's fixed

  • Cannot change values of an AngularJS TimePicker with DateInput bound to a variable in the controller (#4051)

Application

AutoComplete

What's fixed

  • kendo.ui.DropDownList: cannot set autoWidth in html (#3906)
  • AutoWidth is not applied when clearing manually in ComboBox and AutoComplete (#3888)
  • Wrong position of clear button on AutoComplete, ComboBox and MultiSelect in RTL in IE (#3832)
  • AutoComplete's dropdown is not properly resized when noDataTemplate is initially shown and the AutoWidth functionality is enabled. (#3813)

Button

What's fixed

  • kendoButton keeps active state if pressing Enter to trigger click and changing focus inside click event handler (#3908)

Calendar

What's fixed

  • The Calandar selectDates method should clear the selected dates when an empty array is passed. (#3801)
  • Incorrect style is applied in Calendar for March 1st in non-leap years (#3990)

Chart

What's fixed

  • Chart plotArea method should return ChartPlotArea in typescript (#3845)

ColorPicker

ComboBox

What's new

  • Screen Readers does not read value changed via keyboard when popup is closed (#3789)

What's fixed

  • Inconsistent DropDownList cascade behavior on selection in the parent with the keyboard (#2240)
  • DataSource Read is forced on select event of cascading comboboxes (#3943)
  • ComboBox and DropDownList Change event doesn't trigger with the Kendo UI 2018 R1 release (#3926)
  • kendo.ui.DropDownList: cannot set autoWidth in html (#3906)
  • AutoWidth is not applied when clearing manually in ComboBox and AutoComplete (#3888)
  • Wrong position of clear button on AutoComplete, ComboBox and MultiSelect in RTL in IE (#3832)
  • ValueMapper function gets called unexpectedly when ComboBox has initially selected value and the user changes the selection to one of the next items (#2803)
  • Selecting item with virtual scrolling looses the actual item in Firefox (#2787)
  • ComboBox with filter and virtualization throws "Cannot read property 'item' of undefined" error (#4153)
  • ComboBox with paging displays incorrect value if an item that is not on the first page is selected (#4065)
  • ComboBox and DropDownList: Cascade more than 2 combobox is not working (#4042)
  • Change event fires on ComboBox/DropDownList blur (#4009)
  • Menu, ComboBox and DropDownList are not closing correctly with jQuery 3.x.x (#3840)
  • Setting initial value does not work in jQuery 3.1.1 (#3561)
  • Filter is not cleared upon blur after selecting the value of the input (#3965)

DataSource

What's fixed

  • TypeScript: Missing inPlaceSort property for the DataSource in the definitions (#3866)
  • DataSource TypeScript group option should accept any parameter (#3203)
  • Vue datasource is not found in Kendo Window (#4039)
  • Error is thrown when using JSDO batch operations (#4037)

DateInput

What's fixed

  • Cannot change values of an AngularJS TimePicker with DateInput bound to a variable in the controller (#4051)

DatePicker

What's fixed

  • Date/TimePicker popup auto-closes in Chrome when a preceding element's height is reduced (#3986)

DateTimePicker

What's fixed

  • Date/TimePicker popup auto-closes in Chrome when a preceding element's height is reduced (#3986)
  • Setting min property of the DateTimePicker to the last possible value in the TimeView causes the TimeView to display all slots, instead of only the last one (#1984)

Dialog

What's fixed

  • Dialog content is trimmed, if it exceeds dialog dimensions (#3817)
  • Unexpected Dialog buttons left alignment when buttonLayout is set to normal (#3603)
  • Setting the Dialog's actions text with the setOptions method does not work correctly (#3827)

Draggable

What's fixed

  • Fix scrolling root element if drag outside

DropDownList

What's new

  • Screen Readers does not read value changed via keyboard when popup is closed (#3789)

What's fixed

  • Inconsistent DropDownList cascade behavior on selection in the parent with the keyboard (#2240)
  • OptionLabel is not selected when selecting a value that does not exist (#3915)
  • kendo.ui.DropDownList: cannot set autoWidth in html (#3906)
  • DropDownList autoWidth option cannot be set through data attribute (#3863)
  • ComboBox and DropDownList: Cascade more than 2 combobox is not working (#4042)
  • Change event fires on ComboBox/DropDownList blur (#4009)
  • Menu, ComboBox and DropDownList are not closing correctly with jQuery 3.x.x (#3840)
  • Setting initial value does not work in jQuery 3.1.1 (#3561)
  • ComboBox and DropDownList Change event doesn't trigger with the Kendo UI 2018 R1 release (#3926)

Editor

What's new

  • Add `toolbar` field and `toolbar.window` field to Editor TypeScript definition (#4127)

What's fixed

  • Editor adds new lines within comment blocks after viewing the HTML and clicking Update (#3412)
  • Editor removes spaces in IE11 when pasting formatted XML from Visual Studio (#3308)
  • Image is deleted when deleting the last ordered list item using backspace (#3037)
  • Empty hyperlink is inserted when pressing enter at the beginning of link (#2980)
  • Wrong width of Spreadsheet formatting dropdown on second opening - jQuery 3.3.1
  • Table tools are positioned in the toolbar overflow menu when a table is selected

Grid

What's fixed

  • An error occurs when delete an item and save changes with JSDO batch operations
  • Grid does not show data if pager option 'All' is selected (#3924)
  • Dropdowns in Grid filter menu are not closed on devices with touch and mouse (#3835)
  • Kendo Grid data not refresh after Menu Filter clear (#3756)
  • Grid pageSize(All) not persisting after adding a new record (#3424)
  • Validation tooltip visible with correct data in the Grid (#3385)
  • Extend TypeScript definition of GridColumn command (#3217)
  • k-sorted class incorrectly applied in Grid when a column is hidden before sorting (#4138)
  • Navigatable grid does not focus header when multi-filter check is used (#4122)
  • Offline Mode in MVC Grid removes records on Cancel when the record was updated previously (#4105)
  • The Grid validation message is hidden after entering valid and then invalid value(InCell) (#4103)
  • The Grid select method is selecting wrong cells with locked columns. (#4102)
  • PageSize is set to total when number of records is less than the page size (#4092)
  • Grid horizontal scroll is very slow (#4087)
  • Enabling Navigatable in Grid prevents SHIFT+Arrow Keys selection in editors (#4061)
  • Virtualized Grid sorting breaks after scrolling if the Grid was filtered. (#4053)
  • Grid column menu is rendered inside the filter menu after column reordering. (#4046)
  • minResizableWidth does not work with a preceding hidden column (#4043)
  • The Grid with endless scrolling, grouping, and locked column is not collapsing the groups. (#4003)
  • The last two records disappear from the editable, virtualized Grid. (#3997)
  • A JavaScript error is thrown when a new record is added to a filtered MVVM Grid (#3970)
  • Headers inner column change the location between parent columns after reordering (#3936)
  • minResizableWidth is not applied correctly with frozen columns (#3905)
  • It is not possible to change checkbox value in batch editing on devices with Touch and Mouse. (#3836)
  • RTL Grid wrong scroll on setDataSource in Chrome (#3824)
  • The horizontal scroll goes out of sync with Virtualized Grid with locked columns after scroll and click on the scroll arrow (#3779)
  • The selectedKeyNames method will not return the selected elements if the persistSelection is false(default). (#3739)
  • When menu property of some columns is set to false, the columnMenu does not allow hiding all optional columns (#3658)
  • Navigatable batch editing grid has wrong focus on mobile and hybrid devices (#3631)
  • The Grid is not receiving focus when the tab is pressed on Surface(tablet). (#3576)
  • Grid Pager numbers cover bottom Grid row preventing selection on small screens for Bootstrap, Fiori, Flat, and Office365 themes. (#3387)
  • It is not possible to change checkbox value in batch editing on IOS. (#2724)
  • Wrong tab order is applied to the cells of new record item if sorting the grid. (#2712)
  • Grid does not persist selection after cancelling popup editing (#3928)

ListBox

What's fixed

  • The setOptions method of the List Box is not changing the dataTextField property. (#4110)
  • The ListBox toolbar disabled items does not receive a tabindex -1 and can be focused. (#4100)

ListView

What's fixed

  • ListView drag events could not be detected on Windows device with capactive touch screen in IE and Edge browsers. (#3222)

Localization

MVVM

What's new

  • Add ability to define a template as string or function from the model (#4074)

What's fixed

  • DropDownList autoWidth option cannot be set through data attribute (#3863)
  • A JavaScript error is thrown when a new record is added to a filtered MVVM Grid (#3970)

MediaPlayer

What's fixed

  • fullScreen property of the MediaPlayer doesn't work (#3967)
  • MediaPlayer TypeScript functions have Void as a return (#3904)
  • MediaPlayer doesn't load when wrapped in a div with style="display: table;" due to an error in its ToolBar (#4101)
  • Toolbar of MediaPlayer is not initialized correctly when there is not enough width. (#4079)

Menu

What's fixed

  • Input in submenu keeps the submenu popup open (#4004)
  • Menu, ComboBox and DropDownList are not closing correctly with jQuery 3.x.x (#3840)

MultiSelect

What's fixed

  • MultiSelect throws an error if an item is select while filtering (#3821)
  • kendo.ui.DropDownList: cannot set autoWidth in html (#3906)
  • Wrong position of clear button on AutoComplete, ComboBox and MultiSelect in RTL in IE (#3832)
  • All items cannot be selected with keyboard Shift + Arrow key in MultiSelect (#3662)
  • MultiSelect with virtualization loses values on filtering (#4088)
  • Value is deselected on initial load (#4022)
  • Virtual scrolling in MultiSelect. A user's selection is lost when the valueMapper function is not implemented. (#3963)
  • Menu, ComboBox and DropDownList are not closing correctly with jQuery 3.x.x (#3840)
  • MultiSelect throws an error for initially selected items with autoBind: "false" and grouping (#3937)

NumericTextBox

What's fixed

  • NumericTextBox does not reflect changes applied through setOptions (#3945)
  • HTML attributes are cleared from input element on form reset (#3912)
  • The NumericTextBox does not allow writing or paste decimals with decimals 0 and restrictDecimals to false. (#3898)
  • DOM Change Event does not fire (#4158)
  • Widget doesn't calculate floating numbers when rounding is turned off (#2508)

PDF Export

What's new

  • Side-to-side/excel-like PDF Export functionality (#3855)

What's fixed

  • Wrong page sizes in the PDF Export / Page Layout demo (#4159)
  • Table rows are split when exporting to PDF (#4128)
  • Spreadsheet PDF Export last row height is greater than the other rows (#3859)
  • Spreadsheet PDF Export has missing borders (#3858)

Pager

What's fixed

  • Grid does not show data if pager option 'All' is selected (#3924)
  • Grid pageSize(All) not persisting after adding a new record (#3424)

PanelBar

What's new

  • Add templates support for PanelBar in MVVM (#2832)

Scheduler

What's new

  • Scheduler should trigger change on Surface in Chrome (#2184)
  • Scroll acceleration under 2 in 1 devices

What's fixed

  • Start a scroll gesture from event does not scroll content under iOS (#2957)
  • Drag and drop of Kendo Scheduler events does not work properly on Windows 10 touch devices (#2547)

Slider

What's fixed

  • Incorrect position of Slider's Tooltip with jQuery 3.*.* (#3196)

Spreadsheet

What's fixed

  • Wrong width of Spreadsheet formatting dropdown on second opening - jQuery 3.3.1
  • Incorrect formula output with comparison (#4126)
  • Deleting rows when filter is applied deletes hidden rows also (#4120)
  • Spreadsheet does not properly format decimal numbers with more signs after the decimal point (#4064)
  • Spreadsheet displays default row/column width and height if they are explicitly set to 0 (#4062)
  • datasource can not be set as array in vue spreadsheet (#4045)
  • Cell values formatted as percent are incorrect for certain values (#4005)
  • Spreadsheet PDF Export last row height is greater than the other rows (#3859)
  • Spreadsheet PDF Export has missing borders (#3858)
  • Spreadsheet SheetDataSourceBinder class uses a global instance of jQuery (#4150)

TabStrip

What's fixed

  • Setting animation to false does not completely disable TabStrip animation in IE and Edge for Material theme (#3919)

ThemeBuilder LESS

What's fixed

  • Theme builder is not working on Safari. (#2504)

TimePicker

What's fixed

  • Cannot change values of an AngularJS TimePicker with DateInput bound to a variable in the controller (#4051)
  • Date/TimePicker popup auto-closes in Chrome when a preceding element's height is reduced (#3986)
  • Time picker displays invalid last item on some min and max options (#3657)

ToolBar

What's fixed

  • Disabled ToolBar SplitButton can be opened with the keyboard (#1566)
  • Disabled Button in Toolbar should have focus stylization (#3923)
  • Cannot toggle checkboxes in ToolBar overflow popup (#3192)
  • Wrong color of split button arrow by click (#3954)
  • Inconsistent filling of the available space on init and on re-size (#1341)
  • Non-resizable ToolBar throws JS error when tools and separators break on a second line (#4161)
  • MediaPlayer doesn't load when wrapped in a div with style="display: table;" due to an error in its ToolBar (#4101)

TreeList

What's fixed

  • TreeList does not fire expand/collapse events when using keyboard navigation (#3883)
  • TreeList does not reload item children correctly. (#3989)

TreeView

What's new

  • Update indeterminate state of checkboxes when dataSource is filtered (#3910)

What's fixed

  • TreeView template not rendered correctly with special characters (#4104)
  • Checkchild is setting the checked proeprty to disabled items (#4041)
  • Treeview reordering items not placing at expected positions after filtering (#3973)
  • Unable to drag TreeView items with URL set, when dragging starts on items' text (#2492)
  • treeView drag&drop, Uncaught RangeError: Maximum call stack size exceeded (#2245)
  • TreeView's expand/collapse state is inverted after e.preventDefault() on collapse (#2235)

Upload

What's new

  • .k-dropzone-hovered class not removed from Upload's custom dropzone (#2940)

What's fixed

  • Custom Upload Widget instance is no longer available after select (#4132)
  • Chunk Upload throws error, when autoUpload is set to false and a file from the selected files is removed (#3553)

Window

What's fixed

  • Kendo Window fires close event twice on Esc keydown when using preventDefault (#4073)
  • Disabled anchor in Window prevents Tab navigation to other focusable elements (IE) (#3938)
